nodes.text: Mullan was the capital of the Keldrath sector, in the Outer Rim Territories.
History seemed to have skipped Mullan, which was long been known for its placid people and steady flow of good, simple wines and hearty foodstuffs. This planet was located on the Pakuuni Drift.

Discovered during the expansion of Xim's Empire circa 25,100 BBY, Mullan was gathered into the Keldrath Alignment nearly a century after Xim's death. It was eventually part of the Tion Hegemony when the Tion Cluster joined the Republic.

In the Republic's final years, the Tion Cluster worlds joined the CIS and were later members of the Galactic Empire. Mullan and the Keldrath sector were carved out of the Hegemony by the Empire and Mullan was made the capital of the new sector.
